channel.title: CVE Feed for darylldoyle -- svg-sanitizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for darylldoyle -- svg-sanitizer

item.title: CVE-2022-23638|2024-08-03T03:51:45.661Z -- darylldoyle -- svg-sanitizer
item.description: svg-sanitizer is a SVG/XML sanitizer written in PHP. A cross-site scripting vulnerability impacts all users of the `svg-sanitizer` library prior to version 0.15.0. This issue is fixed in version 0.15.0. There is currently no workaround available.
